name: Giraffe Entanglement
description:
Made for Extra Credits Jam #4, interpreting the theme of "Connect" as "Co-Necked".

I unfortunately couldn't manage to finish, but I succeeded in getting it to a state that fully functions (in most cases) and I am super happy I didn't give up on the way.

Enjoy!

Also Credits: Giraffe heads are from the animal asset pack by Kenney, available at https://www.kenney.nl/assets/animal-pac
